editorial_summary.overview: Costumed actors & themed fairground rides depicting macabre stories from London's past.

reviews.text:
We enjoyed fully at London Dungeon it was scary but most like a theater actors were all great. You can't take videos or photos once inside the room theatre. I too was chosen for some characters it was funny but scary too I enjoyedüòÅ. There are some rides inside a dark tunnel with all screams üò≥. The staff there were very friendly. It took 2 hours but fully entertained.
The ladies' room inside the London Dungeon is a must-visit üòÇüëç. In all, I will recommend the London dungeon as a must-visit and a great place for excitement.

Buy tickets directly from their website before arriving, you'll save a lot of money. Don't just mute your phone & watch, turn them off it will help with the experience for all involved. Actors were good & decent dramatization of telling London's macabre history. A few jump scares but not overly haunted house style. We mostly had smiles from the great performances by the actors. They bring the audience into the act. My spouse got picked on a few times which he enjoyed & added to our experience. Some good extras that reminded me of 90's Universal Studios theatrics. One star because 1 feature was not open & another showcase the actor didn't perform. Photo packages are available at the end. Use the bathroom before you begin the tour as there are none till you exit. Overall I'd recommend this attraction.

I loved it so much doesn't even begin to describe it here. From the second I asked the girls at the front how to get tickets and there excitement over my excitement to all the amazing actors and hard working crew. I love this place I took my mother and left out a few surprises for her. Thank you for being a highlight to my London trip with all my dark hyperfixations! And make sure to get drinks at the end!

Such a great experience. If you like creepy gruesome experiences then look no further. The boat ride gave me chills and the seared drop ride almost gave me a heart attach üòÇ

I have to say that each and every person in there was in character which made the experience so amazing. They were all great but my favorite was the girl who made the pies. Her acting was out of this world. Her creepy laugh made me wanna piss my pants laughing.  Also the judge was amazing as well so hilarious.  The acting of the witch was so spooky. It was like being in the exorcist movie. I loved every second of it.

Sorry for taking a pic of my partner when he got picked to be a volunteer. Pictures are videos are not allowed to be taken but I made sure I was in the very back and completely discreet so not to bother anyone else‚Äôs experience.  He hates being picked for anything so I could see he was peeing his pants up there üòÇ

Amazing experience and we all had so much fun. There's a couple rides I wasn't aware about which was pleasantly surprising.
Highly recommended if you're sat on the fence.
10/10 for all the staff too.

address: Riverside Building, County Hall, Westminster Bridge Rd, London SE1 7PB, United Kingdom
